item.title: Contract-First VS Code-First API Documentation
item.description: API development is a crucial part of modern software development. Designing clear, robust, and easy-to-use APIs not only optimizes the development process but also enhances the developer experience. Various methodologies exist for API creation, the two significant approaches are the Contract-First and Code-First methods. This article explores these two approaches in depth. Contract-First API Documentation Contract-first API development kicks off with the API definition. Developers outline all of the API endpoints, the request-response models, the data types, and any possible status codes.
